item.title: Generative Audio Playlist
item.description: #Gridnik - YouTubeEnjoy the videos and music you love, upload original content, and share it all with friends, family, and the world on YouTube.

item.title: All Pass Module - Reverbs
item.description: Polarity discusses the uses of the all-pass filter in Poly Grid . You can get some effects like: 1. Delay 2. Distortion 3. Comb Filtering He also demonstrates how you can construct reverbs using many all pass filters in series (which some other stuff too). He references this technical blog: Reverbs: Diffusion, allpass delays, and metallic artifacts - Valhalla DSPOne of the most common controls found in reverberation algorithms is the Diffusion control.

item.title: Bitwig Scripting

item.title: Bitwig Subreddit
item.description: r/BitwigBitwig is a cross-platform DAW for recording, producing & performing music, with innovative internal modulation system, VST3 and MPE support, clip launcher, deep hardware integration and dedicated touch interface.
